description: Schema for submitting a gene (adapted from ENCODE).
title: Gene

___url.description: Link to the gene record in NCBI
___url.title: NCBI link

___geneid.description: NCBI Entrez GeneID of official nomenclature approved gene.
___geneid.comment: An gene (object) needs to have an Entrez GeneID and needs to be approved by (i.e. have an ID and gene symbol from) offical nomenclature such as HGNC, MGI, FlyBase, WormBase.
___geneid.title: NCBI Entrez GeneID

___synonyms.description: Alternative symbols that have been used to refer to the gene.
___synonyms.comment: The list of synonyms is maintained using information from NCBI Entrez. Synonyms not included in NCBI gene_info can be added but are not actively maintained.
___synonyms.title: Synonyms

items.description: An alternative symbol/name referring to the gene.
items.title: Synonym

___preferred_symbol.description: Preferred gene symbol commonly used by the community.
___preferred_symbol.title: Common symbol

___official_symbol.description: Gene symbol approved by the official nomenclature.
___official_symbol.title: Gene symbol

___genomic_location.description: Location of the gene on it's genome
___genomic_location.title: Genomic Location

___fullname.description: The full gene name preferably approved by the official nomenclature.
___fullname.title: Gene name
